articles.title: Scientists say 6,200-year-old shoes found in cave challenge "simplistic assumptions" about early humans - CBS News
articles.description: Research say the oldest collection of footwear in Europe has been discovered in a cave in southern Spain, dating back more than 6,000 years.
articles.content: Scientists say grass sandals discovered in a cave in Spain are 6,200 years old, making them the oldest woven grass footwear ever discovered in Europe and forcing them to rethink "simplistic assumptio… [+3070 chars]
